DocLocalization.Name: Stab / Seil / Balken mit konstantem Profil / Querschnitt
DocLocalization.Documentation: lineares statisches Bauteil mit Beanspruchung auf Zug, Druck, Biegung oder Torsion

DocAttribute.Name: PredefinedType
DocAttribute.Documentation: Type of member with respect to its load carrying behavior in this analysis idealization.

DocAttribute.Name: Axis
DocAttribute.Documentation:
Direction which is used in the definition of the local z axis. _Axis_ is specified relative to the so-called global coordinate system, i.e. the _SELF\IfcProduct.ObjectPlacement_.
> NOTE  It is desirable and usually possible that many instances of _IfcStructuralCurveConnection_ and _IfcStructuralCurveMember_ share a common instance of _IfcDirection_ as their _Axis_ attribute.

DocWhereRule.Name: HasObjectType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The attribute ObjectType shall be given if the predefined type is set to USERDEFINED.
